name: Summer Program
description: Our summer program includes daily academics aimed at preventing summer learning loss, and afternoons filled with field trips, recreational activities and enrichment opportunities...and a little more afternoon reading. ​The UP ON TOP Summer Program is open to all San Francisco residents currently enrolled in K-5th grade. The program is open to ALL children; however, we ask families to please apply only if they are likely able to attend the program ALL day, EVERY day.
